original_text: For those who serve well as deacons gain a good standing for themselves and also great confidence in the faith that is in Christ Jesus.
korean_text: 집사의 직분을 잘한 자들은 아름다운 지위와 그리스도 예수 안에 있는 믿음에 큰 담력을 얻느니라

sentences.original_text: For those who serve well as deacons
gain a good standing for themselves
and also great confidence in the faith
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 믿음에 대한 큰 확신도 얻습니다
